NightStrike/Rodimus/Blackfang:


Nightstrike howled with pain when the friggen granade exploded, 
somehow he was wounded by it. BlackFang ran towards Rodimus, who was 
slowly recovered 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@c... wrote:
> *Sigh no one takes damage from a friggen grenade come on now
> 
> Crylatrons body scratched and grinded. He went over to 
Rodimus, "Im getting to old for this.." He had one sword, the other 
was broken in shards across the battlefield.He braced for another 
onslaught from the unicron wannabe's.
